title: ISic000552. I.Sicily inscription 000552
body:
Facsimile Images

1FLAMMASICVIXANXXX
2PUGNATXXXIIIIVICITXXI
3STANSVIIIIMISIIIINATSRUS
4HUIDELICATUSCOARMIOMERENTIFECIT

l.1 secutor | l.2 reg., orig. pugnat | l.4 reg., orig. hui

Apparatus criticus

  • Text: CIL

English translation

Flamma, a secutor [gladiator] lived for 30 years, fought 34 times, won 21 times, drew 9 times, was defeated [spared] 4 times. Syrian by nationality. Delicatus built this for a worthy comrade-at-arms

commentary

bibliography

  • 10.7297 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
